languages.text: "То же, что и всегда, Ваша Светлость — несу свет Императора сирым и убогим. Работы невпроворот — голодных, покалеченных и испуганных людей на станции полно".

traits.locale_text: "То же, что и всегда, Ваша Светлость — несу свет Императора сирым и убогим. Работы невпроворот — голодных, покалеченных и испуганных людей с каждым днем все больше и больше. Ее Светлость Инцендия Чорда в своем праведном пылу не видит зверств, которые совершают ее люди в теневых кварталах, прикрываясь ее именем. Я вмешиваюсь где могу, но, честно говоря, силы мои уже на исходе — меня не хватает на то, чтобы помочь всем и каждому".
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."
languages.original_text: "То же, что и всегда, Ваша Светлость — несу свет Императора сирым и убогим. Работы невпроворот — голодных, покалеченных и испуганных людей на станции полно".

traits.locale_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. I'm over my head in work. The station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. I'm over my head in work. The station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

traits.locale_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: “好久不见，大人。我来这里，是为了给那些受压迫的卑微之人带来帝皇的光芒。我最近实在是太忙了，这座星站里到处挤满了饥饿、受伤、惊恐的人们。”
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: “好久不见，大人。我来这里，为那些受压迫的卑微之人带来帝皇的光芒。我最近工作太忙了，这座星站里到处挤满了饥饿、受伤、惊恐的人们。”
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: 「いつもと変わりありません、陛下。皇帝陛下の御光を、賤しく虐げられた者達に分けています。フットフォールで精一杯です。ステーションの人々は飢え、傷つき、怯えている」
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: 「いつもと変わりありません、陛下。皇帝陛下の御光を、賤しく虐げられた者達に分けています。フットフォールで精一杯です。ステーションの人々は飢え、傷つき、怯えている」
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: «Como siempre, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Llevando la luz del Emperador a los pobres y los desamparados. En Paso estoy de trabajo hasta el cuello; la estación está llena de gente hambrienta, tullida y asustada».
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: «Como siempre, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Llevando la luz del Emperador a los pobres y los desamparados. Estoy hasta el cuello. La estación está llena de gente hambrienta, tullida y asustada».
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Wie immer, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich trage das Licht des Imperators zu den Armen und Geknechteten. Ich stecke hier auf Footfall bis zum Hals in Arbeit. Es wimmelt es von hungrigen, verstümmelten und verängstigten Menschen."
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: "Wie immer, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Ich trage das Licht des Imperators zu den Armen und Geknechteten. Ich stecke bis zum Hals in Arbeit. Auf der Station wimmelt es von hungrigen, verstümmelten und verängstigten Menschen."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: « Ce que je fais de mieux, Votre Seigneurie : j'apporte la lumière de l'Empereur aux miséreux et aux opprimés. Et autant dire qu'à Castel, je ne chôme pas. La station regorge de pauvres gens affamés et mutilés en proie à la terreur. »
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: « Ce que je fais de mieux, Votre Seigneurie : j'apporte la lumière de l'Empereur aux miséreux et aux opprimés. Et autant dire qu'ici, je ne chôme pas. La station regorge de pauvres gens affamés et mutilés en proie à la terreur. »
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04

languages.text: "Bildiğiniz gibi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator'un ışığını sıradan insanlara ve ötelenmişlere taşıyorum. Binliman beni fazlasıyla meşgul ediyor. İstasyon aç, sakat ve korkmuş insanlarla dolu."
languages.original_text: "Same as always, Your {mf|Lord|Lady}ship. Bringing the Emperor's light to the lowly and downtrodden. And I have my hands full here on Footfall — the station's teeming with hungry, maimed, and frightened people."

traits.locale_text: "Bildiğiniz gibi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. İmparator'un ışığını sıradan insanlara ve ötelenmişlere taşıyorum. Binliman beni fazlasıyla meşgul ediyor. İstasyon aç, sakat ve korkmuş insanlarla dolup taşıyor."
traits.speaker: Footfall_Chaplain_Ch04
